author: Unity
description:
Unity 6.3 LTS is here - delivering the long-term stability, verified ecosystem, and performance optimizations developers need for confident development in production. 

Highlights include: 
🛠️ Streamlined cross-platform development with Platform Toolkit
🎨 Flexible 2D/3D blending
♿ Native screen-reader support for accessibility
⬆️ Seamless upgradeability
✅ Two years of dedicated LTS support

6.3 LTS is also production-verified and already proving itself: MARVEL SNAP reduced their TypeTree runtime memory usage by 99%, and V Rising cut 4-hour build times by over 50%.

Learn more 👉 https://on.unity.com/Unity-6-3-LTS

#MadeWithUnity #Unity #GameDev #2DArt #3DArt
title: Bring 3D assets into your 2D project with Unity 6.3 LTS's new workflow!

author: Unity
description:
Come and join us for an epic showcase where we reveal the winners of the 17th Unity Awards. 

We will be livestreaming the results on the 9th of December, 2025! Find out more information https://on.unity.com/awards

#madewithunity #unityawards #unityengine #unity
title: The 17th Unity Awards - Teaser Showcase 2025
